meanings: (정보·소식 등을) let sb know, inform, (통보하다) notify, report

vlive.korean: 나 디자이너 브랜드 옷이야 알리고 있지 않나요? reveals that it's a designer brand item? 듣기 View video Fairy Tina : KOREAN STREET BRANDS FASHION HAUL | FAIRY TINA 페어리 티나
vlive.english: reveals that it's a designer brand item?

vlive.korean: [QUESTION. 13 나의 존재를 세상에 널리 알리고 싶어?] [QUESTION. 13 Do you want to make the world know you?] View video MOMO X : [10초의 10초의 10초] 우주대스타 에이스 '찬' 편
vlive.english: [QUESTION. 13 Do you want to make the world know you?]

vlive.korean: 그걸 알리고 싶어서 지금 말하는 그 세 줄 있는... That's what I wanted to share... So that, the three stripes... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]COOKIE DAY
vlive.english: That's what I wanted to share... So that, the three stripes...

vlive.korean: 초등학생인데 뉴이스트를 반에서 알리고 있대요. A grade schooler is spreading news of NU'EST to his classmates. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NU'EST] 배코폭스 사랑해서 시간이 멈췄어...🕐 (Baekho&Minhyun singing songs)
vlive.english: A grade schooler is spreading news of NU'EST to his classmates.

vlive.korean: 조금이나마 알리고 싶어서 하게 됐습니다. To spread that information a bit, is the reason for this exhibition really. 듣기 View video FNC NEOZ SCHOOL : [CNBLUE 정신 X AOA 설현] LOVE FNC 미얀마 봉사활동기 해피빈 기부라이브
vlive.english: To spread that information a bit, is the reason for this exhibition really.

examples.korean: He was eager to communicate his ideas to the group. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기 생각을 그 단체 사람들에게 꼭 알리고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was eager to communicate his ideas to the group. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In the first instance, notify the police and then contact your insurance company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우선 먼저, 경찰에 알리고 당신의[당신이 보험을 든] 보험사에 연락을 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the first instance, notify the police and then contact your insurance company. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I'm sure she would give me a good reference; it's just that I would like to tell her myself that I am leaving and not have her find out unexpectedly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상사가 저에 대해 좋은 평가를 해 주실 거라는 것은 확신하지만 제가 회사를 그만두는 것을 직접 상사에게 알리고 싶고 그 분이 예기치 않게 저의 퇴사를 알게 되기를 원하지 않습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I'm sure she would give me a good reference; it's just that I would like to tell her myself that I am leaving and not have her find out unexpectedly. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The chirping of cicadas signals the start of summer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 매미 소리가 여름의 시작을 알리고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: The chirping of cicadas signals the start of summer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He wanted everyone to know of his successes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자신의 성공을 모든 사람에게 알리고 싶어했다. Neungyule
examples.english: He wanted everyone to know of his successes. Add to Wordbook
